name: [Gameoff 2021] Just don't DIE
description:
Just don't die!

It looks like a common platformer but a litttle.... buggy.

Advance through levels filled with bullet-hell, broken platforms and annoying monsters!  Good luck and remember - do-not-die!

#  [TODO]  Some debug "breakpoint" blocks left. Remove in next update.

github repo - https://github.com/alexbljack/gameoff2021
